titles.title: To require the Comptroller General of the United States to conduct a study regarding the ability of Mexico to carry out its obligations under the North American Free Trade Agreement and the NAFTA Supplemental Agreements.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H8798)

bill.summary: 10/12/1993--Introduced. Directs the Comptroller General to study and report to the Congress on the ability of Mexico to carry out its obligations under the North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA).
